TestDescription.name: Microsoft IIS Server service.cnf file found
TestDescription.Description: Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) installs a file named service.cnf. This file may contain sensitive information, which could allow a remote attacker to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Impact: The file may disclose sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Remove the service.cnf file from the web server or restrict access to this file.

Reference.database: Microsoft Internet Information Services Web page
